Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Enacts the "New York microgrids act"
Summary: Enacts the "New York microgrids act" to establish the microgrids of New York grant program within the New York state energy research and development authority; such program shall award monies to certain areas of the state for the purposes of reducing utility rates, reducing utility demand and encouraging use of renewable energy resources.
LawCode: Add Art 8 Title 9-B §§1900 - 1903, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to enacting the "New York microgrids act"
